definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
to have sth go wrong/to have a problem arise/to give problems

sentences.english: She also taught me five math problems this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她還教了我五道奧數題。

sentences.english: Written expression is an important test content in English entrance examination questions.
sentences.chinese: 書面表達題是高考英語試題中的一項重要測試內容。

sentences.english: Big problem or does not know how to start, or solution is not complete.
sentences.chinese: 大題要麼無從下手，要麼解不全。

sentences.english: How to dance can Hyun second marriage?
sentences.chinese: 如題。炫舞怎麼樣纔可以第二次結婚？

sentences.english: I cannot solve this math problem.
sentences.chinese: 我解沒有開那講數進修題。

sentences.english: The first question is to raise 4 to the third power.
sentences.chinese: 第一道題是使4自乘到三次冪。

sentences.english: Promoting execution is an integrant part of cadres' style building.
sentences.chinese: 提升執行力是幹部作風建設的題中應有之義。

sentences.english: The examination paper is in four sections. Please attempt all sections.
sentences.chinese: 考試題目共分爲四大題，請回答所有的大題。

sentences.english: Two boys entered, each was carring a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 兩個男孩走了進來，每人題提着一隻箱子。

sentences.english: I made a booboo on the last question of the exam.
sentences.chinese: 考試的最後一題，我出了個錯。

sentences.english: Chinese painting has an outstanding characteristic, that is to say, poetry or calligraphy is inscribed on paintings.
sentences.chinese: 中國畫有一個顯著的特色，就是把詩或書法題在畫上。

sentences.english: Plane geometry exam, one problem is drawing, I'm not accurate.
sentences.chinese: 平面幾何考試，有一道題是畫圖，我畫得不夠精確。

sentences.english: Excerpts from three Qing crime cases support these conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 我將摘錄三種清代刑科題本來支持上述論點。

sentences.english: They were ver easy, But I couldn't answer the rest.
sentences.chinese: 這些題很容易，但我回答不出其餘的題。

sentences.english: They were ver easy, But I couldn't answer the rest.
sentences.chinese: 這些題很容易，但我回答不出其餘的題。

sentences.english: Who knows the interactive website system to do question how to do it?
sentences.chinese: 誰知道網頁上的交互做題系統是怎麼做的？

definition: pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
